name: Spikeful
description:
Can you dodge the spikes?

Move the character with the mouse by clicking and holding to aim the circle, then release to move the circle.

Watch out for spikes! If the floor starts flashing, that means a spike will appear there! One hit with a spike means game over, so be careful!

Credits 

Sound Effects were made at sfxr.me

Created for ScoreSpace Jam #13, but I did not manage to submit it in time.
